response.overview: An elderly farmer fighting against searing drought; the loss of his family and livelihood must face his impending demise.  An exploration of decaying masculinity set against the harsh Australian landscape. A sophisticated and poetic piece of filmmaking that deals with the land, masculinity and the destruction of the Australian bush mythos
response.tagline: A sophisticated and poetic piece of filmmaking that deals with the land, climate change, masculinity and the destruction of the Australian bush mythos.
response.title: Wednesday
